general.gigTitle: design and develop a modern wordpress website for your brand

sellerCard.oneLiner: Trusted By More Than 1000 Plus Worldwide Clients
sellerCard.description:
Meet Shubham Dahale, a seasoned professional in eCommerce and WordPress website development, Shopify website development, graphics design, branding, and logo design. With over 1000+ satisfied clients globally. 

Shubham has established himself as a trusted expert in his field.

With a remarkable track record spanning back to 2017, Shubham has successfully completed over 1000+ projects for more than 750 clients across the world. His expertise covers a wide range of services, including:

- WordPress Website
- E-commerce Website
- Branding
- Shopify Store
- Graphics Design
- Custom Website Design

description.content:
Looking to create a brand-new WordPress website or redesign your existing one?

You're in the right place!


With over 7 years of experience, I specialize in designing and developing stunning, fully functional WordPress websites that reflect your brand's style and vision.


What I offer:

  • Website development
  • Modern, brand-aligned design
  • WooCommerce setup for online stores
  • Design customization
  • Speed optimization
  • SEO Friendly
  • Social media and email popup integration
  • Multi-language and currency support
  • Live chat setup
  • Troubleshooting and bug fixes


How will the process work?

  • Choose from a selection of website designs I share with you.
  • Once you select a design, I'll start the development process.
  • I'll keep you updated on progress throughout.
  • Review the initial version upon delivery.
  • Provide feedback, and I'll make any necessary modifications.
  • After your approval, I'll move the site to your main domain and make it live.


Ready to bring your vision to life? Hit that Continue button or Contact Me to get started today!

slide.name: design and develop a modern wordpress website for your brand
design and develop a modern wordpress website for your brand

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: To get started, you'll require a domain name and a hosting account. Additionally, I'll need your logo, the number of pages you want, and any content you'd like to include on your website (content is optional we can also setup website with demo text until you've vontent).

questionsAndAnswers.question: How the process works ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I'll present you with various designs that align with your needs. Once you approve the design, I'll provide you with a quote. I'll then proceed to create and develop your website on one of my own servers.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide hosting and domain?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You can get free hosting if you buy my maintenance package. Ping me for more info!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my live website be impacted?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, i develop websites on one of my own servers and once its ready and order is approved then i make them live on your main domain.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will i get license key with theme?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No. You'll need to buy the license key separately.

reviews.comment: Shubham has an excellent understanding of his work and consistently delivers high-quality results. He helped me with my website, which turned out fantastic. Throughout the process, he was incredibly polite and professional. Working with him was a pleasurehe's truly a gem. I highly recommend his services!

seller_response.comment: Thank you it was a pleasure working with you

reviews.comment: Great service and excellent work, thank you!
Always does a great job, very responsive and easy to work with! Highly recommended!

reviews_snippet.comment: "The work provided was great! He was prompt and responsive and was very helpful with putting my website together! Will use him again

wow!!! what a great experience!  i will place a order here again 100% 
fast delivery, really nice communication, full professional!

What an amazing  job! Communication was great and went above and beyond to complete my website. Knew exactly what needed to be done and completed everything I asked for and more. Made everything very clear and explained everything he was doing. He gave great feedback on ideas and was extremely patient with me. Highly recommended!!

Shubham was an amazing freelancer to work with. He listened attentively to my requests and guidance which resulted in him doing an amazing job and we are very please with the outcome. Highly recommend!

Very good job. This is my second order in less than 2 weeks. I can't wait to order again. The quick communication won over and over again.

Kudos!

notableClients.name: editing by lori
notableClients.interaction_description: Lori has edited hundreds of manuscripts, from fiction to memoirs to self-help books to tales of the paranormal. She collaborated with Oprah-endorsed author Fawn Germer on her books Work-Life Reset and Mermaid Mambo and with author and CBS radio news.
